function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Use of bioaerosol samplers in a hospital environment can lead to potential aerosolized pathogen exposure.","Impact":"Increased risk of pathogen transmission and healthcare-associated infections.","Mitigation":"Use of personal protective equipment (PPE) while handling bioaerosol samplers, conducting sampling in controlled environments, and proper disinfection of sampling equipment.","Technologies":"Biological safety cabinets, negative pressure rooms, and ultraviolet germicidal irradiation (UVGI) for disinfection.","People":"Healthcare workers, patients, visitors, and researchers conducting the sampling.","Owner":"Hospital administration, infection control teams, and researchers."}]}
